description: These treats have the warming flavour of whisky. Mince pies for grown-ups.
name: Whiskey Mince Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 20g unsalted butter, keep some for lining the baking tin
60g shortcrust pastry, rolled and cut into rounds.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the topping ingredients in a bowl fully and then cover and freeze for 20 minutes.
Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Combine all of your mince mix ingredients in a bowl and set to one side.
Prepare a cupcake baking tin but lightly buttering the edges. Press the shortcrust pastry round into the moulds so that it covers thee base and the edges.
Now take the mince mix from the freezer and stuff into the moulds.
Top the moulds with the topping mix and bake in the oven for 20 minutes.
Remove from the oven and suggested serving with whipped cream.
